diff_hunk:
@@ -95,8 +98,45 @@ if [[ ! -z "${TF_DIST_DOCKER_NO_CACHE}" ]] &&
   NO_CACHE_FLAG="--no-cache"
 fi
 
+# Parse command-line arguments.
+CUSTOM_WHL_URL=""
+
+while true; do
+  if [[ $1 == "--whl_url" ]]; then
+    CUSTOM_WHL_URL=$2
+  fi
+
+  shift
+  if [[ -z $1 ]]; then
+    break
+  fi
+done
+
+if [[ -z "${CUSTOM_WHL_URL}" ]]; then
+  BUILD_DIR="${DIR}"
+else
+  # Custom whl file URL is specified. Modify the Dockerfile before building
+  # the docker image.
+  BUILD_DIR=$(mktemp -d)
+  echo ""
+  echo "Using custom whl file URL: ${CUSTOM_WHL_URL}"
+  echo "Building in temporary directory: ${BUILD_DIR}"
+
+  cp -r ${DIR}/* ${BUILD_DIR}/ || \
+    die "Failed to copy files to ${BUILD_DIR}"
+
+  sed -i -r -e "s@https:\/\/.*\.whl@${CUSTOM_WHL_URL}@g" \
body: Same as above. I feel like it might simplify this script.
body_html: Same as above. I feel like it might simplify this script.
body_text: Same as above. I feel like it might simplify this script.
